backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature evidence listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of key frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the IP lookup page and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that manages backend actor creation and refresh based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth, identity loading, and login flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useIpLookup.ts: React Query mutation hook for performing IP or domain lookups via fetchIpInfo.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file; no backend queries used.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorIp.ts: React Query hook that auto-fetches the visitor’s IP with optional details.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining custom OKLCH theme, dark mode, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/ipLookup.ts: Validation helpers and fetchIpInfo function for retrieving IP data from ipapi.co.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry mounting React, initializing QueryClient, and wrapping with providers.
frontend/src/pages/IpLookupPage.tsx: React page that fetches and displays the visitor’s IP, allows manual IP/domain lookup, and toggles optional extra details using custom hooks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugin usage for consistent UI styling.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, and pending requests for an IP lookup website.
